ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: What about Rangers tho, do they get special weapons? They are in the same boat as Paladins. Now I am a bard, so I could be wrong about No ranger swords, but I
ygData.messageBody:
What about Rangers tho, do they get special weapons?

They are in the same boat as Paladins.

Now I am a bard, so I could be wrong about No ranger swords, but I don't
think Paladins should get the most powerful weapon in the game, just because
they take a small exp cut. Most hybrids take this cut, so what makes them
so special? I could see getting a great weapon that is good against undead,
or something to that affect, but as I understand it, Fiery Avenger is the
best weapon in the whole game.

Just my 2coppers.

Wenaddar

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim West [SMTP:twest@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 1:53 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 36
>
> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
>
>
> It has been confirmed on the Holyswords list that Fiery Avenger is a Holy
> Sword and is therefore a Paladin only weapon. The character that holding
> the sword in the picture is a GM and that is why he can hold it. The fact
> that Paladins get the Holy Swords and no one else is to make up for the
> fact that we get 20% less exp. per kill. Paladins also are not great
> fighters like the Warriors, nor are we great healers or buffers like the
> Clerics.
>
> Tanaman
> Lev 15 Paladin
> Veeshan Server.
>
